name: grep-character-string
description: grep character string if existed in the specified directory

scripts.start: rm record.txt | rm save.txt | bash excute.sh ~/workspace/trunk/moxtra/site/themes/css/moxtra-icon.html ~/workspace/grepCharacterString/record.txt ~/workspace/trunk/moxtra/site/template/ ~/workspace/grepCharacterString/save.txt

author: GinMu
